## LocalMinifier class

Minifier implementation that minifies code on the main thread.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class LocalMinifier implements IModuleMinifier
```

<b>Implements:</b> [IModuleMinifier](./module-minifier-plugin.imoduleminifier.md)
